text: To perform our Services, we may disclose your information within Deltek and to third parties for the purposes described in the " How We Use Your Information " Section, or with your consent.

Overall, Deltek will normally collect your information with your consent, to perform a contract (for example, when providing Services), or where the processing is in Deltek's legitimate interests and not overridden by your data protection interests or fundamental rights and freedoms.
An entity that buys us or part of our business may continue to use your data in accordance with the Privacy Policy unless you request otherwise.

Deltek Privacy Policy

Deltek's Privacy Policy

We Collect Information Automatically or From Others
For example, we may use your information to: develop our products, services, promotions, and other offers; respond to your requests, suggestions, and other communications; improve our Services and business operations; and conduct research and analysis for marketing, business and other operational purposes.
To perform our Services, we may disclose your information within Deltek and to third parties for the purposes described in the " How We Use Your Information " Section, or with your consent.
We also retain information for related business purposes, security, legal compliance, and disputes and claims handling, consistent with our retention policy and as permitted by applicable law.
We may also collect information when you share stories, content, experiences, suggestions, preferences or other input (e.g., expressing your preferences, comments, complaints, etc.), or submit requests for information from us.
We may disclose your information to the following types of third parties:
We may require you to provide your first name, last name, email address, and other information to verify your identity.
We use your information to protect the security and integrity of our Sites and Services, for enforcement of our agreement with you (for example, our Deltek General Terms or other similarly applicable agreement) and our compliance with our applicable law.
We use your information to tailor our Sites and Services, promotions, and communications so that they are more useful and relevant to you, such as through targeted advertising and messaging personalization.

This Privacy Policy governs and explains how Deltek, Inc. and its affiliates, subsidiaries, and related entities ( "Deltek" or "we" ) collect, disclose, and use your personal information as we provide services through our website ( www.deltek.com ) and affiliated websites (collectively referred to as, the "Sites" or "websites" ), the applications and products offered by Deltek, and other interactions and communications you may have with Deltek (including through participating in Deltek events) (collectively, the "Services" ).

Our Services and Sites automatically track and collect your IP address, domain server, type of computer or device, and type of web browser.
We may require you to provide your first name, last name, email address, and other information to verify your identity.
Additionally, as part of onboarding customers or hiring employees, we may also collect FEIN or SSN for legal compliance.
We may also provide information on our employment opportunities and job openings).

We may also use the information we collect for our own or our service providers' other operational purposes, purposes for which we provide you additional notice, or for purposes compatible with the context in which the California Personal Information was collected.
We use the information we collect, on its own and combined with other information we collect about you, for the following purposes:

When you submit a request to exercise your rights above, we will use the information you provide to process your request and to maintain a record of your request and our response, as permitted under applicable law.
We Collect Information You Provide to Us We collect personal information that you provide to us, depending on how you interact with us.
